no...\""},{"lineNumber":166720,"originalJapaneseLine":"（そこは……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(That's...!)"},{"lineNumber":166721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぁ、ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":166722,"originalJapaneseLine":"（儂の席だ！！！！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(That's my seat!!!!)"},{"lineNumber":166723,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやぁあぁああああああ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooooaaaaaaaah!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":166724,"originalJapaneseLine":"肺の中のものを全て振り絞るようにニミッツが叫ぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz shouted as if summoning everything from his lungs."},{"lineNumber":166725,"originalJapaneseLine":"首がガクンと下がり、","translatedEnglishLine":"His neck suddenly dropped,"},{"lineNumber":166726,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピクリとも動かなくなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and he stopped moving completely."},{"lineNumber":166727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……ちょ、ちょっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh... w-wait a minute...\""},{"lineNumber":166728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この感じ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This feeling...\""},{"lineNumber":166729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――まさか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—No way!\""},{"lineNumber":166730,"originalJapaneseLine":"俯いていたニミッツ――","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz, who had been looking down—"},{"lineNumber":166731,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、レキシントンが顔を上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it was Lexington who raised his face."},{"lineNumber":166732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":166733,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔を一目見た瞬間、アトランタが理解に至る。","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment Atlanta saw his face, she understood."},{"lineNumber":166734,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジュノーは一足先に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Juno, a step ahead,"},{"lineNumber":166735,"originalJapaneseLine":"既にその場に跪いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was already kneeling there."},{"lineNumber":166736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、寝ぼすけなのは変わらないね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, you haven't changed your sleepyhead ways."},{"lineNumber":166737,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手間がかかるのも懐かしいよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s nostalgic how much trouble you cause.\""},{"lineNumber":166738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お帰りなさい、そして……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Welcome back, and..."},{"lineNumber":166739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おはようございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"good morning.\""},{"lineNumber":166740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我が主」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My lord.\""},{"lineNumber":166741,"originalJapaneseLine":"鬼の魔人レキシントンが頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon majin Lexington nodded."},{"lineNumber":166742,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":166743,"originalJapaneseLine":"レキシントンが首の骨をゴキゴキと景気よく鳴らす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington cracked his neck bones cheerfully."},{"lineNumber":166744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁー、やれやれだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haah, what a relief!\""},{"lineNumber":166745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのガキ、こっちに見向きもせんから参ったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That brat wouldn't even look this way, which was a pain,"},{"lineNumber":166746,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようやく魂ごと消滅できた」","translatedEnglishLine":"but finally, I was able to eliminate him with his soul.\""},{"lineNumber":166747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yo!\""},{"lineNumber":166748,"originalJapaneseLine":"レキシントンが金棒を振り回す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington swung his iron club around."},{"lineNumber":166749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...!\""},{"lineNumber":166750,"originalJapaneseLine":"風を切るその轟音だけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just by the roaring sound of cutting through the wind,"},{"lineNumber":166751,"originalJapaneseLine":"今までのレキシントンとは","translatedEnglishLine":"it was clear he was different from the Lexington before."},{"lineNumber":166752,"originalJapaneseLine":"一線を画すことが理解できた。","translatedEnglishLine":"One could understand that he now stood apart."},{"lineNumber":166753,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、本人は苦々しげに顔を歪めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, he himself grimaced with bitterness."},{"lineNumber":166754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――駄目だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—No good.\""},{"lineNumber":166755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女の体は重心が微妙に違うから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A woman's body has a slightly different center of gravity,"},{"lineNumber":166756,"originalJapaneseLine":"　動かしにくい上に、てんで体が鈍ってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"making it hard to move, and my body is completely out of shape.\""},{"lineNumber":166757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、今にも戦に出てぇーって","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But my body is itching to go out into battle at any moment...\""},{"lineNumber":166758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体が疼きよるわい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My body aches for it...\""},{"lineNumber":166759,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":166760,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり！　それでこそレキシントン様です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the Lexington-sama I know!\""},{"lineNumber":166761,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら、レキシントン！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, Lexington!\""},{"lineNumber":166762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早速、戦いに出ましょう！","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's head out to battle immediately!"},{"lineNumber":166763,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな時間ですが、なーに、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's this time of day, but, well,"},{"lineNumber":166764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　鬼共に声をかければ大喜びで――」","translatedEnglishLine":"if we call out to the demons, they'll be thrilled—\""},{"lineNumber":166765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ことわーーーーーる！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I REFUSE!!!!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":166766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":166767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh...\""},{"lineNumber":166768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿野郎、起き抜けだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiot, you just woke up.\""},{"lineNumber":166769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「酒の一杯や二杯や三百杯は飲まねぇと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I don't drink one, two, or three hundred cups of sake,"},{"lineNumber":166770,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体が重たくって仕方ねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"my body just feels heavy and sluggish.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、ニミッツの心の中に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, inside Nimitz's mind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツ以外の声が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a voice other than Nimitz's echoed.
"Huh? Eh? Wh-what was that just now...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の声は徐々に徐々に大きくなり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The inner voice gradually grew louder and louder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その存在感を増していく。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Get out of the way! ...Get out of the way!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肺の中のものを全て振り絞るようにニミッツが叫ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz shouted as if summoning everything from his lungs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピクリとも動かなくなる。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz, who had been looking down—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、レキシントンが顔を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it was Lexington who raised his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔を一目見た瞬間、アトランタが理解に至る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Atlanta saw his face, she understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にその場に跪いていた。
「まったく、寝ぼすけなのは変わらないね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, you haven't changed your sleepyhead ways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手間がかかるのも懐かしいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s nostalgic how much trouble you cause."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼の魔人レキシントンが頷いた。
レキシントンが首の骨をゴキゴキと景気よく鳴らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington cracked his neck bones cheerfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのガキ、こっちに見向きもせんから参ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That brat wouldn't even look this way, which was a pain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく魂ごと消滅できた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but finally, I was able to eliminate him with his soul."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンが金棒を振り回す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington swung his iron club around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 風を切るその轟音だけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just by the roaring sound of cutting through the wind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までのレキシントンとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was clear he was different from the Lexington before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一線を画すことが理解できた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One could understand that he now stood apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、本人は苦々しげに顔を歪めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, he himself grimaced with bitterness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女の体は重心が微妙に違うから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A woman's body has a slightly different center of gravity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動かしにくい上に、てんで体が鈍ってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it hard to move, and my body is completely out of shape."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、今にも戦に出てぇーって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But my body is itching to go out into battle at any moment..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり！　それでこそレキシントン様です！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's head out to battle immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな時間ですが、なーに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's this time of day, but, well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼共に声をかければ大喜びで――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if we call out to the demons, they'll be thrilled—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「酒の一杯や二杯や三百杯は飲まねぇと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I don't drink one, two, or three hundred cups of sake,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体が重たくって仕方ねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my body just feels heavy and sluggish."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, inside Nimitz's mind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツ以外の声が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a voice other than Nimitz's echoed.
"Huh? Eh? Wh-what was that just now...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の声は徐々に徐々に大きくなり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The inner voice gradually grew louder and louder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その存在感を増していく。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Get out of the way! ...Get out of the way!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肺の中のものを全て振り絞るようにニミッツが叫ぶ。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it was Lexington who raised his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔を一目見た瞬間、アトランタが理解に至る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Atlanta saw his face, she understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にその場に跪いていた。
「まったく、寝ぼすけなのは変わらないね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, you haven't changed your sleepyhead ways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手間がかかるのも懐かしいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s nostalgic how much trouble you cause."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington cracked his neck bones cheerfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのガキ、こっちに見向きもせんから参ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That brat wouldn't even look this way, which was a pain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく魂ごと消滅できた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but finally, I was able to eliminate him with his soul."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington swung his iron club around.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One could understand that he now stood apart.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, he himself grimaced with bitterness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動かしにくい上に、てんで体が鈍ってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it hard to move, and my body is completely out of shape."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、今にも戦に出てぇーって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But my body is itching to go out into battle at any moment..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり！　それでこそレキシントン様です！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's head out to battle immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな時間ですが、なーに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's this time of day, but, well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼共に声をかければ大喜びで――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if we call out to the demons, they'll be thrilled—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「酒の一杯や二杯や三百杯は飲まねぇと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I don't drink one, two, or three hundred cups of sake,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体が重たくって仕方ねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my body just feels heavy and sluggish."
